title: The Besties Podcast III (from the archive)
description: This episode of The Besties was recorded in a hotel room in San Francisco (hence the garbage audio). But hey, that's what happens when we all (except for Griffin) have to travel for GDC 2012!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
